body: @Annalbelle69 hmm... that's a pretty good point actually. What is the secret to your wisdom sir?

@L0lic0пwizard - That's a little hypocritical coming from a real alien like yourself mister. It ain't that bad, just ignore the speech bubbles and all of a sudden it's not that bad. It's simple but hot in my opinion.
nHentai needs a 'slut' or 'non-virgin' tag so people aren't in for surprises like this when they find out the girl goes around fucking other men.
This whole thing felt slightly off... like it was made by an alien or someone who's never actually read a hentai before.
